parameters.name: AppIds
parameters.description: The ID of the baseline application.

parameters.name: EntryAppId
parameters.description: The unique ID of the corresponding gateway.

parameters.name: EntryAppType
parameters.description:
The application entry type (gateway type).

*   **apig:** cloud-native API Gateway
*   **mse:** Java Services Gateway
*   **mse-gw:** MSE cloud-native Gateway

parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the lane group. This is required when you update a lane group.

parameters.name: GroupName
parameters.description: The name of the lane group.

parameters.name: SwimVersion
parameters.description: The end-to-end grayscale version. Valid values: 0 and 2 (recommended).
